## Usage

When working on the ML Extensions website, Copilot will automatically use relevant skills based on your prompts. For example:

- **"Create a product page for ML Kitchens"** â†’ Uses `sketchup-extension-product-page`
- **"Add a purchase button"** â†’ Uses `gumroad-ecommerce-integration`  
- **"Write marketing copy for the homepage"** â†’ Uses `extension-marketing-content`
- **"Optimize website performance"** â†’ Uses `extension-website-performance`
- **"Get the latest React patterns"** â†’ Uses `context7-library-integration`
- **"Test the purchase flow"** â†’ Uses `playwright-frontend-testing`

## Project Context

This website showcases ML Extensions for SketchUp:
- **ML Kitchens** - Advanced kitchen design tools
- **ML Doors** - Comprehensive door and window library  
- **Future extensions** - More tools coming soon

**Tech Stack:** React + Vite + Tailwind CSS + Gumroad
**Target Audience:** Architects, interior designers, contractors using SketchUp
